item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle AMD FSR 3 Mod Released by PureDark
item.content:encoded:
https://wccftech.com/indiana-jones-and-the-great-circle-amd-fsr-3-mod-released-by-puredark/

Earlier this week, renowned modder PureDark released an AMD FSR 3 mod for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle. As usual, the mod is locked behind being a subscriber on his Patreon, and even PureDark told his community:

Note that the devs have announced that future updates will include official FSR3 implementation. Think twice before subscribing!

Indeed, developer MachineGames confirmed alongside the release of the second title update that AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution would be added in a future patch. However, they didn't specifically state whether that would also include the frame generation component, which is indeed available in PureDark's mod and makes a big difference.

Not only that, it even works on portable devices like Valve's Steam Deck. YouTuber Grown Up Gaming tested it and noticed that the performance went from 20-25 frames per second to around 40 frames per second with the upscaling set to Quality. Lowering that to Performance mode provides another 10 frames or so, but at that point, the game doesn't look very good.

Granted, it is a miracle Indiana Jones and the Great Circle even works on the Steam Deck. The game's system requirements technically include hardware ray tracing support, and we all know that the Deck's ray tracing performance is not its strongest suit, to say the least.

It's certainly not like I would like to play this game. If I absolutely had to do it on the go, I'd prefer using GeForce NOW to stream it via cloud and still get ray tracing features and smooth performance. PureDark's mod will probably be more useful to all those desktop users who do not own an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 GPU, providing a way to essentially double the frame rate for free.

Whether you plan to use it or not, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is absolutely worth playing, as I explained in my review:

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is an excellent adventure/action game that features one of the best Indiana Jones stories, great level design that rewards exploration, and awesome ray traced visuals. This might just be the best game dedicated to Dr. Henry Walton we've ever seen.

At least one story DLC titled The Order of the Giants is on its way, though there's no release window yet.

item.title: Rediscover Comfort with the Sihoo Doro C Series – Now Available at a Massive New Year Discount
item.content:encoded:
https://wccftech.com/rediscover-comfort-with-the-sihoo-doro-c300-and-c300-pro-chairs/

Sihoo has been a pioneer when it comes to bringing forward ergonomic furniture that emphasizes comfort and health. It has been established well in the industry by constantly bringing forward innovative products and designs through technological advancement since 2011. Every product of the company has a distinctive quality with user-centric solutions incorporated across everything, making the furniture perfect for supporting modern lifestyles. The company's vigorous efforts in bringing forward ergonomic innovations and improving users' lives have borne fruit as the work- and health-focused Sihoo has earned massive recognition in the North American market. The company keeps on striving to bring excellence and extends its health-focused products worldwide.

The Sihoo Doro C Series offers comfort and lumbar support

Sihoo's Doro C Series is a classic range that tends to offer comfort as well as a timeless design, making it perfect for users who want to enhance their workplace health or have to sit for extended periods. The adjustable lumbar support reduces strain on the back that is caused by longer sitting, and with the help of the breathable mesh fabric, users can enjoy a comfortable sitting experience. With features to improve posture and reduce discomfort, the Doro C Series truly allows you to "Restore Health, Rediscover Comfort. The Doro C Series is the ultimate ergonomic chair for work, gaming, and even creative processes.

Sihoo Doro C300 Pro Ergonomic Office Chair

The Sihoo Doro C300 Pro Ergonomic office chair is considered the premium version of the best-selling series and is considered to be perfect for users with different body sizes or even heights due to the wide adjustability it offers. The Doro C300 Pro, with its comfort, can be viewed as a partner in your well-being because of the way it elevates your sitting experience. The comprehensive chair with extended support is not the only part that makes this ergonomic solution truly worth buying; the color options it is available also keep the user's aesthetics in view.

The listed price for the Doro C300 Pro black version on the official website is $699.99, but with the ongoing Christmas and New Year's Sale, you can get your hands on the premium chair for only $339.99. The white version, however, is priced at $709.99 but can be bought for only $349.99 with the current promotional deal. Keep in mind, though, that the offer is for a limited time only, as it is available until January 3rd, 2025.

The Doro C300 Pro Ergonomic chair is ideal for users who greatly value a tailored and advanced adjustment system and offers features that make it truly stand out. We will take a quick look at some of its key features below, and you can also head over to the official store for more detailed info.

Self-adaptive Lumbar Support

The Sihoo Doro C300 Pro comes with a Body Movement Tracking system that provides automatic lumbar support adjustment as you move or change positions so that it aligns perfectly with your spine without constantly having to make adjustments manually. This seamless comfort helps reduce the chances of feeling fatigued due to the consistent lower back support.

Bigger Waterfall-Shaped Cushion with Seat Depth Adjustment

The large waterfall-shaped cushion the chair is packed with helps users feel more comfortable, especially during longer sittings, due to the pressure it relieves from the thighs and improves overall circulation. The seat depth adjustment allows users to personalize their sitting experience by adjusting it to their body size and leg length, which also aids in maintaining proper posture.

Complete Control in One Handle

The Sihoo Doro C300 Pro comes with enhanced functionality as the operations can be controlled through one handle only, which is placed on the right-hand side of the chair. Real-life adjustments can give users a seamless experience through an interrupted workflow by effortlessly adapting to various needs. Providing a generous maximum recline angle of 135°, the Sihoo Doro C300 Pro enables you to relax in a more comfortable position when you require a brief break from your work.

Flexible Seat Back-Contouring to Your Back

The Sihoo Doro C300 Pro additionally comes with a flexible seat back that can automatically adapt to your spine for a more personalized sitting experience and also for more optimized ergonomic support. The design mimics the natural alignment of the spine, allowing for better posture and reduced pressure on the back.

Other than that, the C300 Pro comes with a 6D coordinated armrest, uses a breathable mesh fabric, and adheres to the quality standards by the regulations, including the BIFMA and SGS certifications.

Sihoo Doro C300 Ergonomic Office Chair

Sihoo Doro C300 is the company's selling product, and if you look at the design, you will find the Doro C300 and the Doro C300 Pro chair to be almost identical, with minor differences only. The product is well received by users, especially those who seek good value for money. Some users who have shared their experience with the chair even went ahead and painted the Pro model as merely a refreshed version rather than offering some major Pro model upgrades. The Doro C300 is perfect for users who are looking for a chair that provides all-day support and helps with chronic back pain with effective lumbar support.

The listed price of the Doro C300 Ergonomic Chair on the official website is $399.99 for the black model, but the promotional offer brings the price to only $239.99. Similarly, the white version's original price is $409.99, but with the ongoing promotion, it can be purchased for only $249.99. Just like with the Pro model, the Doro C300 chair's Christmas and New Year Special is available for only a limited time, so for users who have been wanting to upgrade, now is the time.

Similar to the C300 Pro model, the C300 offers self-adaptive lumbar support that automatically adapts itself according to the natural contour of your spine, allowing for continuous support and more comfort by reducing the strain on the back. Other features that make the model stand out include:

Flexible Backrest

The Sihoo Doro C300 has a streamlined design that supports movement, especially upper body support. Its triangular frame design ensures a continuous flexible backrest with a supportive structure.

Wide Multi-Adjustable Headrest

The Doro C300 chair is perfect for gaming sessions or even work that requires long sitting. It is equipped with a 3D mechanical headrest that provides support for your head and neck and reduces tension in the neck and shoulder that can be caused by extended use.

Adaptable Mechanism and Comfortable Reclining

The Sihoo Doro C300 comes with an advanced, adaptable mechanism and a comfortable reclining mechanism that can help tailor the seating experience according to users' preferences. The tilt angles are varied and can go up to 130 degrees for dynamic lumbar support.

Additionally, it offers a 4D directional armrest with varied adjustment options, allowing you to comfortably rest your arms in different positions, whether at work or even when playing a game. The Doro C300 ensures comfort with its waterfall-shaped seat, which offers extensive seating support by optimally distributing the weight.

Sihoo Doro C300 and C300 Pro offer extended lumbar support and redefine seating comfort. With the enticing offer, users should not wait to indulge in the most comfortable seating experience.
